summary: This document is a forwarded email chain from July 2020 discussing allegations that former President Bill Clinton made 32 plane trips to Jeffrey Epstein's island and questioning why he has not been interviewed or charged. The email originates from Andy Kay and is forwarded through at least one intermediary.

persons.name: Andy Kay
persons.context: Author of the original email questioning why former President Bill Clinton has not been interviewed or charged regarding trips to Jeffrey Epstein's island.

persons.name: Bill Clinton
persons.context: Subject of allegations that he made 32 plane trips to Jeffrey Epstein's island, with questions raised about why he has not been interviewed or charged.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The document references his island in connection with alleged trips by Bill Clinton.

connections.description: Alleged connection through 32 plane trips by Clinton to Epstein's island, as claimed in the email.

keyFacts: An email from Andy Kay dated July 2, 2020, alleges that former President Bill Clinton made 32 plane trips to Jeffrey Epstein's island.
The email questions why Bill Clinton has not been interviewed or charged in relation to these alleged trips.
The document shows this allegation being forwarded through email chains on July 6, 2020.
